alert.note: Alert for Baylor; Foard; Knox; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued April 26 at 9:40AM CDT until April 26 at 11:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM CDT THIS MORNING FOR NORTHWESTERN BAYLOR, SOUTHEASTERN FOARD, NORTHEASTERN KNOX AND SOUTHWESTERN WILBARGER COUNTIES... At 940 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain has moved out of the warned area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing and will likely continue for the next hour or so as runoff continues. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Gilliland and western Lake Kemp. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
